about.details:
Incorporated in 2012, Tara Chand Logistic Solutions Ltd is engaged in providing logistic and supply chain services including transportation and warehousing, equipment rental and steel processing and distribution in India.

They offers their services to a broad range of industries which includes steel, urban and rural infrastructure, oil and gas, renewable energy etc.

Company's major clientele includes Reliance industries ltd, Larsen & Toubro ltd (seven Independent Companies), Steel Authority of India ltd, Rashtriya Ispat Nigam ltd, Oil and
Natural Gas Corporation ltd, Tata Projects ltd, Hindustan Construction Company ltd, Vedanta ltd, J Kumar Infraprojects ltd, NCC ltd, Welspun Corp, ITD Cementation India ltd, Bharat Heavy Electricals ltd, Gayatri Projects Ltd, Megha Engineering & Infrastructures ltd.

faqs.question: What is the Tara Chand Logistic IPO?
faqs.answer:
Tara Chand Logistic IPO is a SME IPO of 3720000 equity shares of the face value of ₹10 aggregating up to ₹20.46 Crores. The issue is priced at ₹55 per share. The minimum order quantity is 2000.

The IPO opens on March 13, 2018, and closes on March 15, 2018.

Sharex Dynamic (India) Pvt Ltd is the registrar for the IPO. The shares are proposed to be listed on NSE SME.

faqs.question: How to apply in Tara Chand Logistic IPO through Zerodha?
faqs.answer:
Zerodha customers can apply online in Tara Chand Logistic IPO using UPI as a payment gateway. Zerodha customers can apply in Tara Chand Logistic IPO by login into Zerodha Console (back office) and submitting an IPO application form.

Steps to apply in Tara Chand Logistic IPO through Zerodha

  1. Visit the Zerodha website and login to Console.
  2. Go to Portfolio and click the IPOs link.
  3. Go to the 'Tara Chand Logistic IPO' row and click the 'Bid' button.
  4. Enter your UPI ID, Quantity, and Price.
  5. Submit IPO application form.
  6. Visit the UPI App (net banking or BHIM) to approve the mandate.

Visit Zerodha IPO Application Process Review for more detail.

faqs.question: When Tara Chand Logistic IPO will open?
faqs.answer: The Tara Chand Logistic IPO opens on March 13, 2018 and closes on March 15, 2018.

faqs.question: What is the lot size of Tara Chand Logistic IPO?
faqs.answer: Tara Chand Logistic IPO lot size is 2000, and the minimum amount required is ₹1,10,000.

faqs.question: How to apply for Tara Chand Logistic IPO?
faqs.answer: You can apply in Tara Chand Logistic IPO online using either UPI or ASBA as a payment method. ASBA IPO application is available in the net banking of your bank account. UPI IPO application is offered by brokers who don't offer banking services. Read more detail about applying IPO online through Zerodha, Upstox, 5Paisa, Nuvama, HDFC Bank, and SBI Bank.
